tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (NN Home) (RB alone)) (PP (IN for) (NP (CD 3) (NNS hours)))) (NP (NP (DT every) (NN night)) (NP (DT this) (NN week)))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Home/NN advmod>alone/RB nmod:for>[hours/NNS case>for/IN nummod>3/CD] dep>[night/NN det>every/DT dep>[week/NN det>this/DT]]]
